title: Sunken U-Boats Off North Carolina Coast A Significant Find For Historians
teaser: The North Carolina coast may be the last place you'd think to find a sunken German submarine from World War II. But that's what Joe Hoyt — a nautical archeologist — found on a recent expedition to the ocean floor. Robert Siegel talks to him about the underwater battle site there.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
